Class PlotDesign

java.lang.Object
View
PlotDesign
public class PlotDesign
extends View

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class View

    buttonHeight, buttonWidth, gardenHeight, gardenTopLeftX, gardenTopLeftY, gardenWidth, plantImages, screenHeight, screenWidth

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PlotDesign​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, Controller c, ManageViews manageView)
    Adds the drawing functionality with the Freedraw button Creates the screen flow by adding clear, back, save, done buttons

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void backButtons()
    Creates the buttons Back in both dimSwitch and drawSwitch lists
    void clearButtons()
    Creates the buttons Undo and Clear in dimSwitch and drawSwitch lists, respectively
    void createHBox​(java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.Button> list)
    Creates an HBox using the ArrayList of Buttons provided Allows for transition of buttons between two screens (plotting and setting dimensions)
    void disableDrawing​(javafx.scene.Node n)
    Disables the drawing handlers when user presses the Button passed
    void onDrawing()
    Calls handlers in controller when user is drawing
    void onSettingDimensions()
    Called when user hits "save" on their plot.
    void onShape()
    Creates the polygon shape when the button Polygon is pressed.
    void saveButtons()
    Creates the buttons Next and Save in dimSwitch and drawSwitch lists, respectively
    void toggleAnchorHandler()
    Toggles the drag handler for the Anchor depending on the boolean dragAnchor.
    void toolbarButtons()
    Creates the buttons Freehand and Polygon in the toolbar
    void validateSave()
    If the user has drawn a plot on their screen, this method is called when the user hits save Switches to the dimension setting screen

  • Method Details

    • toolbarButtons

      public void toolbarButtons()
      Creates the buttons Freehand and Polygon in the toolbar

    • backButtons

      public void backButtons()
      Creates the buttons Back in both dimSwitch and drawSwitch lists

    • clearButtons

      public void clearButtons()
      Creates the buttons Undo and Clear in dimSwitch and drawSwitch lists, respectively

    • saveButtons

      public void saveButtons()
      Creates the buttons Next and Save in dimSwitch and drawSwitch lists, respectively

    • validateSave

      public void validateSave()
      If the user has drawn a plot on their screen, this method is called when the user hits save Switches to the dimension setting screen

    • onSettingDimensions

      public void onSettingDimensions()
      Called when user hits "save" on their plot. Allows users to select any linear length and input its dimension. Saves the inputed value and calls settingLength in controller to calculate length per pixel

    • createHBox

      public void createHBox​(java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.Button> list)
      Creates an HBox using the ArrayList of Buttons provided Allows for transition of buttons between two screens (plotting and setting dimensions)
      Parameters:
      ArrayList -

    • onDrawing

      public void onDrawing()
      Calls handlers in controller when user is drawing

    • disableDrawing

      public void disableDrawing​(javafx.scene.Node n)
      Disables the drawing handlers when user presses the Button passed
      Parameters:
      Button - that disables drawing when pressed

    • onShape

      public void onShape()
      Creates the polygon shape when the button Polygon is pressed. Initializes the anchors.

    • toggleAnchorHandler

      public void toggleAnchorHandler()
      Toggles the drag handler for the Anchor depending on the boolean dragAnchor. dragAnchor is changed to true and false depending if the anchors should be draggable
